title: BUILDING & WOODWORK TECH TECHNICAL  EDUCATION
de_requirements: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering
utme_requirements: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering
subjects: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Physics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

title: EDUCATION & INTEGRATED SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Integrated         Science

 

(ii)   NCE Science

       Education

 

(iii)  'A' Level         passes in two (2)Science subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Biology, Chemistry, English Language and Mathematics
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION AND ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION AND ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION AND IGBO:
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE/'A' Level passes in Igbo and any relevant subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language and Igbo.
subjects: Igbo and two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION FINE AND APPLIED ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)    NCE merit in Fine and Applied Arts Double Major.

(ii)'A' Level passes in Fine Arts and any other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II or NTC/NBC merit including Fine Art and English Language.
subjects: Fine Arts, one (1) other Arts subject and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION FOUNDATIONS & MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include the subjects to be offered.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, the subject of study and three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: The subject of study and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATIONS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include the subjects to be offered.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, the subject of study and three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: The subject of study and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: EDUCATIONAL MANAGEMENT AND POLICY
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes from Literature in English, History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.

(ii)  NCE merit in the subjects listed above.
utme_requirements:
(i) Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics.

(ii)  Five (5) TC II merit including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) of Literature In English, History, French, Geography/Physics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING TECHNICAL EDUC
de_requirements: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering
utme_requirements: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering
subjects: Same as in Electrical Electronics Engineering

title: GUIDANCE AND COUNSELLING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or NCE in two (2) subjects plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: HUMAN KINETICS & HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements: No Direct Entry
utme_requirements: As in Physical and Health Education
subjects: As in Physical and Health Education

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject plus the UTME requirements.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other relevant Arts/Sciences/Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: MECHANICAL/AUTOMOBILE ENGINEERING TECHNICAL EDUC
de_requirements:
NCE merit in relevant subjects.

 

 Two (2) 'A' Level passes in the subjects listed under the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in English Language Mathematics and one (1) of Biology /Agricultural Science; Physics, or Chemistry and two (2) from General Science/IntegratedScience, Technical Drawing/Fine Art, Geography, Health Science Food and Nutrition, Physical and Health Education, Auto Technical, Building, Electrical Electronic, Metal Work and Wood Work.
subjects: Math, Physics and any other subject.

title: SCIENCE EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant Science subjects which should include candidates proposed course.

(ii)   NCE credit/merit in addition to TC II merit or 'O' Level credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Three (3) relevant Science or NBC subjects

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)     NCE merit in two (2) relevant Science subjects plus the UTME requirements.

 

(ii)    Two 'A' Level passes in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects which must include English Language and Mathematics or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry.

title: VOCATIONAL & TECHNICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) NCE merit in Technical Education.

(ii) ND in Mechanical/Electrical or Electronics Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in NTC, City and Guilds Part I or WAEC Technical and Federal Craft Training Certificate including English Language, Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Physics, subject of specialization.
subjects: Subjects of specialization and Mathematics or Physics.
